content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-0.5, -9.5)
Consists of steam engine (position -0.5, -9.5) and boiler (position -4.5, 23.0) connected to offshore pump (position -10.5, 25.5).

### Offshore pump at position(-10.5, 25.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump (position -10.5, 25.5)
- Pipe connections to nearby entities.

### Copper plate mine at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position 0, 0) and a furnace (position 0, 0).
- Burner mining drill (position 5, 5) and a furnace (position 5, 5).

### Copper cable factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine at position(z1) and inserter at position(a) that puts into assembling machine.
- Beltgroup (position) that connects the furnace at position y1 to assembling machine at position(z1).

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting pipes
- Ensure that there are no obstructions in the path of the pipes before attempting to connect them. Check for nearby entities that may block the connection.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors related to power connections
- Verify that all entities requiring power are properly connected to the electricity network. Check for any disconnected poles or entities that may not be receiving power.
